title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master modern web development from scratch. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and deploy them to production.

lessons.title: Welcome to the Course
lessons.description: Get started with your web development journey. Learn what we'll cover and set up your development environment.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Environment
lessons.description: Install and configure all the necessary tools including VS Code, Node.js, and Git.

lessons.title: Module Quiz
lessons.description: Test your understanding of the introduction module.

lessons.title: HTML Basics
lessons.description: Learn the building blocks of the web with HTML elements, attributes, and semantic markup.

lessons.title: CSS Styling
lessons.description: Master CSS selectors, properties, and modern layout techniques including Flexbox and Grid.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming and data analysis. Master pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, and machine learning basics with scikit-learn.

lessons.title: Python Basics
lessons.description: Master Python syntax, data types, and control structures.

lessons.title: Functions and Modules
lessons.description: Learn to write reusable code with functions and organize projects with modules.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: Complete digital marketing course covering SEO, social media marketing, content strategy, email marketing, and analytics.

lessons.title: Introduction to SEO
lessons.description: Understand how search engines work and the basics of SEO.

title: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Master user interface and user experience design. Learn design thinking, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing with Figma.

lessons.title: Introduction to Design Thinking
lessons.description: Learn the design thinking process and how to solve problems creatively.

title: Financial Management Fundamentals
description: Learn essential financial management skills including budgeting, investing, risk management, and financial planning.

lessons.title: Understanding Personal Finance
lessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of managing your personal finances effectively.

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Learn to create iOS and Android apps with a single codebase.

lessons.title: Getting Started with React Native
lessons.description: Set up your React Native development environment and create your first app.
